Identity.Name: Alchemist Uzrill
Identity.Basic_Description: Small Ratfolk looking humanoid with hunched back and green flames in a vial

Abilities.Name: Ammunition
Abilities.Ability: Uzrill starts the game with 3 vial tokens on his character. These can be used for other Abilities.

Abilities.Name: Vial of Borax
Abilities.Ability: Cost 1 Vial Token: Once per turn as an action, choose a character withing 10 range. Roll a d20. On a roll higher than 10, that character takes 1 distress. Then keep repeating this ability for the cloest character within 3 range of the last hit character if that has not been targeted yet this turn.

Abilities.Name: Vial of Smoke
Abilities.Ability: Cost 1 Vial Token: Once per turn as an action, Choose a location within 7 range of Uzrill and put a Smoke Bomb template on it. All line of site and movement Abilities within within 5 range of of that template are blocked. Remove this bomb at the start of Uzrills next turn.

Abilities.Name: Vial of Incense
Abilities.Ability: Cost 1 Vial Token: Once per turn as an action, Choose a location  within 7 range of Uzrill and put an Incense Template on it. Any unit starting its turn or that moves within 3 range of the token loses 1 energy that turn. (This ability cannot reduce a units energy below 1)

Abilities.Name: Concoct
Abilities.Ability: Cost 4 energy: Add one vial token to Uzrill's character. You cannot have more than 3 vial tokens at one time.
